author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ladbrokes ‍Launches Consent Solicitation Over Some Bonds​
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - LADBROKES:
* ‍LAUNCH OF CONSENT SOLICITATION IN RESPECT OF BONDS​ * ‍LAUNCHES CONSENT SOLICITATION IN RESPECT OF ITS £100,000,000 5.125 PER CENT. BONDS DUE 2022 AND £400,000,000 5.125 PER CENT. NOTES DUE 2023
* ‍GVC BELIEVES ABSENT ANY ADVERSE IMPACT OF TRIENNIAL REVIEW ON LADBROKES’ UK BUSINESS, HEADCOUNT REDUCTION WILL BE UNDER 5 PERCENT OF ENLARGED GROUP
* ‍IN ABSENCE OF APPROVAL FOR GUARANTOR SUBSTITUTION TO GVC, NEITHER COS HAVE ANY CURRENT NEED OR INTENTION TO REDEEM ANY OF 2022 OR 2023 NOTES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
